.rooms.title: Our rooms
.rooms.room1-text: Our Loguivy room is a spacious 21m2 room on the second floor. It has a large walk-in shower and seperate toilet. A king size bed with quality linnen hepls you get a good nights sleep
.rooms.room2-text: Our brehat room is a spacious 23m2 room on the second floor. It has a large walk-in shower and seperate toilet. A king size bed with quality linnen hepls you get a good nights sleep. A sleeping couch offers the possibility to host a 3rd guest
.rooms.room3-text: Our arcoust room is a spacious 30m2 room on the first floor. It has a large walk-in shower and seperate toilet. A king size bed with quality linnen hepls you get a good nights sleep. A sleeping couch offers the possibility to host a 3rd guest and there is a sitting area to absorb the wonderfull atmosphere of this traditionnely styled room
